CHAT.comment: First home visit; took place in kitchen; CHI and Mot sat side by side in separate chairs while Mot read
Book Reading 1 The Very Hungry Caterpillar

u.a: CHI looks at picture and smiles shyly
aft Mot looks at CHI for his reaction
MOT pointed to each food as it was named
CHI stretches and looks at Mot
aft Mot leaves to get book
Sis and a friend are playing a game . they can be heard throughout the book reading
CHI stands by his chair and does not respond
CHI nods , smiles shyly , and nuzzles mother
